sense.gloss: brother-in-law (spouse's older brother or older sister's husband)

sdata.j: ↑義兄↑↓|ぎけい|↓は↑些細↑↓ささい↓なことですぐ↑怒↑↓いか↓り↑出↑↓だ↓す。
sdata.e: My brother-in-law is ready to lose his temper at trifles.

sdata.j: ↑新↑↓あたら↓しい↑親戚↑↓しんせき↓ができたよ。↑姉↑↓あね↓が↑結婚↑↓けっこん↓して、↑義兄↑↓|ぎけい|↓ができたんだ。
sdata.e: I have a new relative: my sister got married, so now I have a brother-in-law.

sdata.j: ↑義兄↑↓|ぎけい|↓は↑些細↑↓ささい↓なことですぐ↑怒↑↓いか↓り↑出↑↓だ↓す。
sdata.e: My brother-in-law easily loses his temper from trivial matters.
